body:
Comment 2 by **ma.adameit**: 
I am using strawberry-perl-5.18.1.1-64bit.
Go tip resolved this issue.

There is still a problem with pdf or svg generation:

go tool pprof --pdf test.exe test.prof > test.pdf
Dropping nodes with <= 9 samples; edges with <= 1 abs(samples)
The command "dot" cannot be found. (Windows error translated by me)

The created pdf has 0kb size.

Thank you for the help.

Manuel
